snippet: Syria's main political opposition group in exile agreed on Saturday to attend internationally sponsored peace talks, and said for the first time three rebel fighting forces also wanted to take part....

headline.print_headline: Syrian Opposition Says to Attend Talks, Backed by Rebel Fighters
headline.main: Syrian Opposition Says to Attend Talks, Backed by Rebel Fighters

lead_paragraph: Syria's main political opposition group in exile agreed on Saturday to attend internationally sponsored peace talks, and said for the first time three rebel fighting forces also wanted to take part.
